cyberInputMappingInfo:
</br>3. Cyber Input Variable Mapping Information:</br>
(1) initial_position is mapped to the variable named Angle_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(2) When the value of Angle_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated initial_position.</br>

(3) initial_velocity is mapped to the variable named Friction_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(4) When the value of Friction_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated initial_velocity.</br>
